text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Speaking as an honors student, I'd say
it's not so bad.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, everyone fought very well this
time! Indeed, they did!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As class president, I'm happy to see
that your sweat and tears have been
rewarded!
choice_data_list: Bakushin O did her best, too!
Is that really all you want?
Is that really all you want?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As class president, I'm happy to see
that your sweat and tears have been
rewarded!
choice_data_list: Bakushin O did her best, too!
Is that really all you want?
Is that really all you want?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, I did my best. 
I did my best, too……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Howeveeeer! It is my solemn duty to be 
first place, even when everyone else is 
working so hard!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As class president, I just have to be
the first one to reach the goal so I can
properly welcome everyone!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Next time, every last one of my rivals! 
I'll be there to greet you at the goal!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
King of Speed Award! The King of
Exemplary Figures award must go to me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Next time, I shall aim for an exemplary
and complete victory…… Alright, now!
Bakushiiiiiii――n！！！！！
